content: here s gumball the kitten worsted yarn version if you want to know more about gumball the kitten and his crusade to take over the world try here 1 and here 2 for more information see http //quakingaspen wordpress com/2007/11/03/gumballpattern/ http //quakingaspen wordpress com/2008/06/14/worsted-gumball-the-kitten-pattern-v2/ errata has been incorporated into pattern as well toy kitten cat amigurumi 1 http //secret-agent-josephine com/blog/2007/01/14/gumball-takes-over-the-world/ 2 http //flickr com/groups/gumball-takes-over/
